items.title: ma (question particle)
items.comment: Used at the end of a sentence to turn it into a yes/no question. Example: '你是学生吗？' (Are you a student?)

items.title: ne (question particle)
items.comment: Used to ask 'what about' someone or something. Example: '你呢？' (What about you?)

items.title: ba (suggestion particle)
items.comment: Used to make suggestions or soften statements. Example: '我们走吧。' (Let's go.)

items.title: shéi / shuí (who)
items.comment: Used to ask 'who.' Example: '他是谁？' (Who is he?)

items.title: shénme (what)
items.comment: Used to ask 'what.' Example: '这是什么？' (What is this?)

items.title: nǎ (which/where)
items.comment: Used to ask 'which' or 'where.' Example: '你是哪国人？' (Which country are you from?)

items.title: zěnme (how)
items.comment: Used to ask 'how' or 'why.' Example: '你怎么了？' (What's wrong with you?)

items.title: duōshǎo (how many/how much)
items.comment: Used to ask about quantity. Example: '这个多少钱？' (How much is this?)

items.title: jǐ (how many)
items.comment: Used to ask about small numbers. Example: '你有几个兄弟姐妹？' (How many siblings do you have?)

items.title: wèishénme (why)
items.comment: Used to ask 'why.' Example: '你为什么学习中文？' (Why do you study Chinese?)
